name: cube-pay-hackathons
description: AR Cube Pay - Unified monorepo for hackathon submissions

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm run build || echo 'No backend build needed'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && npm test || echo 'No backend tests'
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && npm test || echo 'No frontend tests'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'No backend linting'
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint || echo 'No frontend linting'
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/node_modules backend/dist node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..

author: AR Cube Pay Team
